items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty back above 24,600, Sensex up 304 pts amid buying across sectors

items.title: Nifty Clocks Triple-Digit Rally To Reclaim 24,600; Nykaa, Honasa & Paytm Shine| Closing Bell Live
items.description: Nifty reclaims 24,600; logs triple-digit upmove. Broader markets fare better; smallcap index up for 3rd day. NSE advance-decline ratio at 3:2. Autos, metals and pharma continue to do well. FMCG and PSU banks out of favour. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.
